languages.text: {n}Друкари замирает, тяжело дыша, в его глазах — изумление и горькое разочарование. А в следующую секунду он разражается потоком непереводимой ксеносской брани и скатывается с вас, одновременно убирая клинок.{/n}

{n}Marazhai freezes, breathing heavily, his eyes radiating shock and bitterest disappointment. A moment later, he unleashes a torrent of untranslatable xenos profanity and rolls off you, sheathing the blade.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Друкари замирает, тяжело дыша, в его глазах — изумление и горькое разочарование. А в следующую секунду он разражается потоком непереводимой ксеносской брани и скатывается с вас, одновременно убирая клинок.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai freezes, breathing heavily, his eyes radiating shock and bitterest disappointment. A moment later, he unleashes a torrent of untranslatable xenos profanity and rolls off you, sheathing the blade.{/n}

{n}Marazhai freezes, breathing heavily, his eyes radiating shock and bitterest disappointment. A moment later, he unleashes a torrent of untranslatable xenos profanity and rolls off you, sheathing the blade.{/n}

{n}Marazhai freezes, breathing heavily, his eyes radiating shock and bitterest disappointment. A moment later, he unleashes a torrent of untranslatable xenos profanity and rolls off you, sheathing the blade.{/n}

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋愣住了，大口大口地喘着粗气，眼神中流露着震惊与无比苦涩的失望。片刻之后，他吐出一连串无法翻译的异形脏话，随后从你身上滚了下来，将刀收了回去。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai freezes, breathing heavily, his eyes radiating shock and bitterest disappointment. A moment later, he unleashes a torrent of untranslatable xenos profanity and rolls off you, sheathing the blade.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋愣住了，大口大口地喘着粗气，眼神中流露着震惊与无比苦涩的失望。片刻之后，他吐出一连串无法翻译的异形脏话，随后从你身上滚了下来，将刀收了回去。{/n}

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは固まって、ハァハァと息を荒げ、その目にはショックと激しい失望の色が滲んでいる。次の瞬間、翻訳できない異種族語で激しく暴言を吐き、刃を鞘に収めてこちらを突き飛ばした。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai freezes, breathing heavily, his eyes radiating shock and bitterest disappointment. A moment later, he unleashes a torrent of untranslatable xenos profanity and rolls off you, sheathing the blade.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは固まって、ハァハァと息を荒げ、その目にはショックと激しい失望の色が滲んでいる。次の瞬間、翻訳できない異種族語で激しく暴言を吐き、刃を鞘に収めてこちらを突き飛ばした。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se queda muy quieto, jadeando intensamente, con una expresión que destila sorpresa y la más amarga decepción. Luego profiere una sarta de intraducibles improperios xenos, se aparta de ti dando una voltereta y envaina el puñal.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai freezes, breathing heavily, his eyes radiating shock and bitterest disappointment. A moment later, he unleashes a torrent of untranslatable xenos profanity and rolls off you, sheathing the blade.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai se queda muy quieto, jadeando intensamente, con una expresión que destila sorpresa y la más amarga decepción. Luego profiere una sarta de intraducibles improperios xenos, se aparta de ti dando una voltereta y envaina el puñal.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai s'immobilise, le souffle court et le regard empreint de stupéfaction et de déception mêlées. Un instant plus tard, il lâche un torrent d'injures xénos intraduisibles et s'écarte d'une roulade tout en rengainant son épée.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai freezes, breathing heavily, his eyes radiating shock and bitterest disappointment. A moment later, he unleashes a torrent of untranslatable xenos profanity and rolls off you, sheathing the blade.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai s'immobilise, le souffle court et le regard empreint de stupéfaction et de déception mêlées. Un instant plus tard, il lâche un torrent d'injures xénos intraduisibles et s'écarte d'une roulade tout en rengainant son épée.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai erstarrt, er atmet schwer und seine Augen strahlen Schock und bitterste Enttäuschung aus. Kurz darauf lässt er eine unübersetzbare Xenos-Schimpftirade ab, wendet sich von dir ab und zieht seine Klinge.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai freezes, breathing heavily, his eyes radiating shock and bitterest disappointment. A moment later, he unleashes a torrent of untranslatable xenos profanity and rolls off you, sheathing the blade.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai erstarrt, er atmet schwer und seine Augen strahlen Schock und bitterste Enttäuschung aus. Kurz darauf lässt er eine unübersetzbare Xenos-Schimpftirade ab, wendet sich von dir ab und zieht seine Klinge.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai donakalıp derin derin nefes alıyor. Gözlerinden şaşkınlık ve şiddetli hayal kırıklığı yayılıyor. Bir süre sonra dudaklarından tercümesi imkânsız zeno küfürleriyle dolu bir sel akmaya başlıyor. Elinde çektiği bıçağıyla yuvarlanıp senden uzaklaşıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai freezes, breathing heavily, his eyes radiating shock and bitterest disappointment. A moment later, he unleashes a torrent of untranslatable xenos profanity and rolls off you, sheathing the blade.{/n}
